https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ia5XG5U5Gn7DN9Z4S6psjA3KX6Q.jpg Four backpackers arrive in Thailand to party and drink. A gambling game goes wrong and with their lives on the line they desperately decide to kidnap a billionaires daughter. Things go wrong when her 'father' doesn't play ball and prefers to use the kidnapping to further his own interests. Bangkok Adrenaline
